# WJP DXF Editor — All‑in‑One Package (v2)
Phase‑2/3 scaffold with selection, layers, groups, draw, measure, basic validate hooks.

## Quickstart
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
streamlit run wjp_editor.py
```
Upload a DXF → use sidebar tools → Save or Send to Analyzer (stub).

## Notes
- Works in mm by default.
- Selection: enter click coords (temporary); proper canvas selection can be added later.
- Validate/Repair: basic placeholders provided with Shapely hooks.
